duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute effective referral sources with Financial Representatives and staff members.
Build and develop productive centers of influence (COIs) to generate qualified leads.
Actively participate in community clubs and organizations to promote and brand Northwestern Mutual.
Review resumes, conduct initial interviews, and guide candidates through the selection process.
Report weekly activity to leadership teams and use recruiting ratios to identify and implement process improvements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree from an accredited institution, or 5+ years of professional or military experience
